message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if you were to acquire it at a special introductory price of $9500. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a discount.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but my budget is quite limited. Would you be willing to consider selling it to me for $8500?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To better accommodate your needs while still valuing our product, I am willing to offer the product to you for $9000. This price reflects the value we place on your interest and allows for a fair transaction.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I'm glad we're finding common ground. Considering the value of your product and my budget, I propose a price of $8750.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. In order to reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I am proposing a price of $9250 for the product. This price reflects its true value while also considering your budgetary constraints.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $8900 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation and my budget.
Considering your latest proposal, I am willing to sell the product to you for $9100. This price balances the value of the product with your budgetary considerations.
Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. I would like to propose a final price of $8850 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between the value of the product and my budget.

I appreciate your effort to find a fair solution, Bob. Based on your last offer, I am willing to sell the product to you for $9000. This price reflects a reasonable compromise between the value of the product and your budget.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a final price of $8950 for the product.
